title: Text-tracing strategies to enhance multimedia learning effectiveness

context.additional_context: Language education program for professionals in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% information integration accuracy using text-following techniques in multimedia materials (integrated/separated text-image formats).
Learners accurately recognize cognitive load differences based on divided attention/integrated formats in simulation environments with over 70% precision.
Learners retain over 90% of learning content as short-term memory by the second week in VR-based formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
